• Updates to the Boards
 - Announce a post, or mention members when uploading a post.
 - Add or remove photos/videos you have added in a post.
 - Long-tap a photo/video/file message to announce them.
 - Members will be notified when there is a new announcement.
 - View poll status at a glance
• Voice call updates (iOS 10 or over)
 - Incoming call screen has been improved.
 - You can now make a KakaoTalk voice call from the Phone app.
• Set image resolution for sending images in Settings > Image Resolution
• You can now disable snowing background in Kakao Lab > Snowing Background.
• Added a new Keyword Mentions feature in Kakao Lab  (iOS 9 or over)

• You can now apply the 2 new themes to your KakaoTalk: Jay-G and Simple Black. 
• Screen capture chats 
- In a chatroom’s + menu, tap Capture and the chat bubbles you wish to capture. 
- You can apply Mosaic to profile photos and hide names in the captured chats. 
• You can now add drawings to your photo when editing. 
• The keywords you have added in the Keyword Alerts will be synced with Windows or Mac OS. 
• Users can now rejoin the open chatrooms they have been removed.

• Design improvements 
- The profile shape has been changed. 
- You can now add friends or start a chat using the icons on the top of the Friends and Chats tab. 
• You can now use polls and create events in Open Chat. 
• Grouping option in the Friends tab is no longer available. 
• Updates to the customized theme guide 
- Please refer to the updated guide and update your themes that have been used for KakaoTalk version below 8.0.0

: Use your iPhone fonts on KakaoTalk.

[v9.4.0]
• Added the Lock Textbox function in a chatroom  
: You can make an input field read-only in a chatroom not to send a wrong message by mistake.          
• Improved the Screen Capture function in a chatroom           
: You can now take a screenshot of your chatroom wallpaper after resetting KakaoFriends emoticons as your profile image or applying the default wallpaper.          
• Added the Manage Multi-profile function in a chatroom         
: You can directly set Multi-Profile by each contact as you want via 'Change Profile' at the top of your friends' profile screen.
